Learn moreWeb Analytics SoftwareLookerLooker Software Review4.6 (279)Last updated on August 17, 2025Provider data verified by our Software & Services Research team, and reviews moderated by our Reviews Verification team. Learn moreVisit WebsiteKey TakeawaysAlternativesInterfaceFeaturesPricingIntegrationsTalk to an Expert - FREELooker4.6 (279)Visit WebsiteWhat is Looker?Looker, now part of Google Cloud, is reinventing business intelligence for the modern company. Looker works the way the web does, and its unique modeling language lets any employee leverage the work of your best data analysts. Operating 100% in-database, Looker capitalizes on the newest, fastest analytic databases to get real results, in real-time.

Looker's lightweight open architecture makes it easy for developers to quickly and flexibly build, deploy, and iterate custom on data applications.What is Looker used for?Data VisualizationDashboardReportingSee allRecognitionsShortlistin 4 categoriesOverall ratingBased on 279 user reviewsSee all reviews4.5Reviews sentimentPositive94%Neutral6%Negative1%Starting price$2000Per MonthView PricingFree trialavailableTry for freeCapterra Shortlist charts the highest-rated and most popular products to help you create a better software list. Those that have no reviews appear next, sorted alphabetically.Data Visualization4.6 (94)Graphical representation of dataReporting/Analytics4.7 (77)View and track pertinent metricsData Connectors4.4 (66)Connect to big data sourcesMultiple Data Sources4.8 (51)Allows users to manage data from a number of sourcesData Import/Export4.4 (49)Import and export data to and from software applicationsKPI Monitoring4.4 (44)Tracking the status of previously identified performance measurementsSee all 104 features →Features4.4 (277)4.4Based on 277 reviewsPricingValue for money4.4 (197)Free TrialSee pricing Plan DetailsBasic$2,000Per MonthTry for freeValue for money4.4 (197)4.4Based on 197 reviewsView pricing plan detailsIntegrationsSlackMicrosoft ExcelSalesforce Sales CloudMailchimpGoogle WorkspaceQuickBooks OnlineGoogle Analytics 360HubSpot Marketing HubSee all 18 integrationsCapterra verified reviews for LookerHow are reviews collected?Overall ratingWrite a review4.6Based on 279 reviewsFilter by rating5(174)4(87)3(16)2(1)1(1)Sorted by most recentEGErika G.Data AnalystInformation Technology and Services"Powerful tool that empowers data ownership"5.0August 9, 2025ProsIt has blended data feature which allows to create a single table from different data sources like Google Analytics and Google Search Console.ConsSome data does not refresh automatically so you need to connect again using data connectors and reload.Review sourceView lessParsa G.AI Data and Insights AnalystInformation Technology and Services"Solid dashboard tool"4.0August 7, 2025It is very easy to configure and implement dashboards on looker. For any company where GCP is their main source of ground truth, it is best choice but if you have equal possibility of using alternatives, there might be better options in the market as well.ProsIt was very easy implementation and linking the data to GCP. It was used as the dashboard tool both for internal(marketing and business) and external(clients) teams. UI was user friendly and easy to set up.ConsThere were a few bugs and issues with the dashboard. Some was that there were discrepancies between the main database and GCP, which resulted in missing data in the final dashboard.Review sourceContinue readingJMJames M.Client Partner DirectorInformation Technology and Services"A Rich Tool Sometimes Overlooked Compared to Competition"4.0August 4, 2025ProsLooker is a rich and easy to use platform.  It supports a lot of great connections and building visualizations or modifying them is intuitive.ConsGoogle Organizations and Google Groups on occasion can be confusing as you manage the organization of or cleanse access to Looker dashboards.Review sourceContinue readingCBChristoph B.COOHospitality"Versatile and one size solution for data analytics"4.0July 29, 2025self-service and easy to use for the teams - difficult to churn away from because of the easy handling by the teams.ProsVersatility to self program and apply analytics with various data warehouse structures. Also bug fixing and changes in data structures can easily be understood by teams without customer support involvement.ConsSome visual representations are falling behind the competitors. This especially plays a role when making the visuals fit / scrolling for various screens.Review sourceContinue readingALAlexandra L.Customer success managerMarketing and Advertising"My go-to for client reports"3.0July 16, 2025Once you understand the system, it gets easy to use and it’s very flexible. At the moment I am delivering 200 monthly reports with this source, works great and is reliable.ProsThe reports are very customable, you can design a report almost as if you were working in power point. Like a drag-and-drop of different type of charts, and everything is connected to the sources you integrate.ConsIt takes time to understand the tool, the resources integration can be confusing when you start using it. Also many useful charts are not available unless you install extensions. Would be also good if you could connect more resources than just Google ones, for example Facebook or linked in, without having to pay a third party for this solution.Switched fromSemrushWhatagraphWe needed something more accurate and more customizable. Also a cheaper solution with more options.Review sourceContinue readingJLJames L.Product ManagementHealth, Wellness and Fitness"Looker is a solid BI tool"5.0May 31, 2025Overall, I've had a really good time with Looker. It's a solid BI platform that truly shines in how it handles data and lets people help themselves. LookML is a game-changer for keeping our data clean and empowering users. It's totally helped us understand our data better. Even though I sometimes wish for cooler native charts, Looker's flexibility and data modeling capabilities definitely make up for it. It's a fantastic choice if you need a powerful and adaptable BI tool.ProsLooker's flexibility is awesome, especially with its LookML modeling. It means we define our business logic once, and it's consistent everywhere. This makes it super easy for anyone to dig into the data without needing to know complex code. Plus, quickly creating new reports and drilling down is a breeze. Version control for LookML is also a huge win for teamwork!ConsMy main gripe is with the visualizations. Looker's great for data, but I really wish it had more advanced and complex chart types built-in. Sometimes, for really specific visuals, I have to export data or use other tools, which isn't ideal. While you can build custom visuals, it's not as straightforward as I'd like, and the standard options feel a bit basic for telling richer data stories.Review sourceContinue readingLSLaura S.SDRFinancial Services"Great dashboard tool"4.0May 18, 2025Great tool to have all the organizational data in a visual dashboard to interpret, we mainly use it to compare sales objetives vs results, and evolutionsProsIt is a great tool to visualize data, from results to objetives, evolutions, etcConsIt is sometimes a little bit slow to charge the dashboardsReview sourceContinue readingMSMara S.Head of MarketingMarketing and Advertising"Okay product for data visualisation"3.0April 27, 2025Good product if you are looking for a free data visualisation tool. Google products integrate quite well but external ones need to be connected via connectors, which can be expensiveProsGood free tool from Google for data visualisation and dashboard buildingConsBreaks quite often and customisations can be limited. Also, extra connectors need to be paidReview sourceContinue readingTSTheresa S.Senior Account ExecutiveComputer Software"Gutes KPI Tool, das aber nicht so benutzerfreundlich ist"3.0April 25, 2025Starkes Tool zum Managen von KPIs, die UI lässt allerdings zu wünschen übrigProsStarke Auswertung von sämtlichen Kennzahlen in verschiedensten Diagrammtypen.
Direkte Integration von HubspotConsLange Ladezeiten (v.a. bei Filterfunktion) und recht unübersichtliches Interface, das es schwer macht, gesuchte Dashboards zu findenReview sourceContinue readingEEEugen E.IT ControllerMachinery"Looker: A advanced analytics platform "4.0April 6, 2025ProsLooker is an excellent data modeling software with strong version control featuresConsComplex configuration and setup for initial useReview sourceContinue readingView all ReviewsPopular comparisonsMicrosoft Power BI vs LookerTableau vs LookerGoogle Analytics 360 vs LookerGoogle Data Studio vs LookerMATLAB vs LookerDomo vs LookerVisio vs LookerZoho Analytics vs LookerGrow vs LookerSAP Analytics Cloud vs LookerSisense vs LookerQlik Sense vs LookerReportei vs LookerSAS Visual Analytics vs LookerMinitab vs LookerClicData vs LookerKlips vs LookerJMP vs LookerCRM Analytics vs Looker Independent research methodologyCapterra's researchers use a mix of verified reviews, independent research and objective methodologies to bring you selection and ranking information you can trust. While we may earn a referral fee when you visit a provider through our links or speak to an advisor, this has no influence on our research or methodology.Learn moreHow Capterra verifies reviewsCapterra carefully verified over 2.5 million+ reviews to bring you authentic software and services experiences from real users. Our human moderators verify that reviewers are real people and that reviews are authentic. They use leading tech to analyze text quality and to detect plagiarism and generative AI.Learn moreHow Capterra ensures transparencyCapterra lists all providers across its website—not just those that pay us—so that users can make informed purchase decisions. Capterra is free for users. Software and service providers pay us for sponsored profiles to receive web traffic and sales opportunities. Sponsored profiles include a link-out icon that takes users to the provider's website.Learn more
